rootCause: Docker tag format error when using matrix.platform (e.g., 'linux/amd64') directly in tag name. Slashes are not allowed in Docker tags, causing 'invalid reference format' error.
resolution: Added a step to convert platform string by replacing '/' with '-' before using in Docker tag. Example: 'linux/amd64' becomes 'linux-amd64' for tag 'scan-linux-amd64'.
